tldr: Due to a vulnerability in the image optimization functionality of `next`, the package is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). Protocol-relative URLs are not treated as actual relative URLs.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a `@cloudflare/next-on-pages` version which is within vulnerability ranges.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@cloudflare/next-on-pages` library to the patch version.
